ModMetaData.name: Electricity Meter
ModMetaData.author: JalapenoLabs
ModMetaData.description:
What is using up all my electricity?!
Introducing a researchable power meter!
Once it's attached to a power grid, it will show you a full breakdown of: - All power consumption items on the grid - All power generation items on the grid
All languages supported, and open source. Enjoy! Patreon: https://www.jalapenolabs.io/patreon
